__note__: This is file is autogenerated, do not edit it manually. For more info https://data.aoe4world.com/

data.name: Archer
data.description:
Cheap ranged infantry with good damage vs. unarmored targets.
+ High rate of fire
- Weak against armored targets
- Countered by Horsemen

data.name: Veteran Archer
data.description:
Cheap ranged infantry with good damage vs. unarmored targets.
+ High rate of fire
- Weak against armored targets
- Countered by Horsemen

data.name: Elite Archer
data.description:
Cheap ranged infantry with good damage vs. unarmored targets.
+ High rate of fire
- Weak against armored targets
- Countered by Horsemen

data.name: Atabeg
data.description: Can be garrisoned into any military production building to grant +20% health to newly trained units.

data.name: Baghlah
data.description:
Ship equipped with broadside ballistae.
+ Strong against Arrow Ships
- Lower maneuverability

data.name: Battering Ram
data.description:
Durable infantry transport effective against buildings and walls.
+ High ranged armor
+ High health
- Takes bonus damage from melee attacks
- Can only attack buildings
- Slow movement speed

data.name: Bedouin Skirmisher
data.description:
Ranged infantry wielding a javelin to fend off lightly armored enemies.
+ Bonus against light infantry
+ Long Range
- Weak against cavalry

Requires the Trade Wing - Bazaar

data.name: Bedouin Swordsman
data.description:
Master Swordsman who excels in melee combat
+ Bonus vs Melee units
- Weak to ranged units

Requires the Trade Wing - Bazaar

data.name: Bombard
data.description:
Intimidating siege gun excellent against buildings or any stubborn targets.
+ High damage
- Must be set up to fire

data.name: Camel Lancer
data.description:
Higher mobility Lancer with a more powerful charge, but less powerful melee attack. Effective against most units.
+ Heavy armor
+ Strong in melee combat
- Countered by Spearmen and Crossbowmen

data.name: Elite Camel Lancer
data.description:
Higher mobility Lancer with a more powerful charge, but less powerful melee attack. Effective against most units.
+ Heavy armor
+ Strong in melee combat
- Countered by Spearmen and Crossbowmen

data.name: Counterweight Trebuchet
data.description:
Powerful siege engine effective at destroying buildings and walls over a great distance.
+ Bonus damage vs buildings
- Must be set up to fire
- Inaccurate against units

data.name: Crossbowman
data.description:
High damage ranged unit best against armored targets.
+ Anti-armor specialist
- Low health
- Countered by Horsemen

data.name: Elite Crossbowman
data.description:
High damage ranged unit best against armored targets.
+ Anti-armor specialist
- Low health
- Countered by Horsemen

data.name: Culverin
data.description:
Long-range cannon made for destroying siege engines. Fires after quickly setting up.
+ Bonus damage vs. siege engines
- Low damage vs. buildings

data.name: Dervish
data.description:
Mounted Religious unit. Can pick up Relics, convert enemy units, and capture Sacred Sites.
+ Uses a powerful Mass Heal ability to heal friendly units in an area.
+ Gains increased Healing when carrying a relic.
+ High speed.

data.name: Desert Raider
data.description:
Versatile Cavalry unit that can swap between ranged and melee attacks with a toggle.
+ Effective against Light Infantry in Ranged Mode
+ Effective against Cavalry in Melee Mode
- High cost
- Weak to Ranged units

data.name: Veteran Desert Raider
data.description:
Versatile Cavalry unit that can swap between ranged and melee attacks with a toggle.
+ Effective against Light Infantry in Ranged Mode
+ Effective against Cavalry in Melee Mode
- High cost
- Weak to Ranged units

data.name: Elite Desert Raider
data.description:
Versatile Cavalry unit that can swap between ranged and melee attacks with a toggle.
+ Effective against Light Infantry in Ranged Mode
+ Effective against Cavalry in Melee Mode
- High cost
- Weak to Ranged units

data.name: Dhow
data.description:
Light war vessel armed with a crew of archers.
+ Increased maneuverability and speed.
+ Benefits from ranged damage Blacksmith technology

data.name: Explosive Dhow
data.description:
Small ship packed with explosives. Detonates when killed, damaging any units in the area.
- Damage is reduced further from the explosion center
- No weapons other than self-destruction

data.name: Fishing Boat
data.description:
Small boat that gathers Food from either Deep Water Fish or Shoreline Fish. Drops off gathered resources at the Dock.
+ Can repair
- No combat

data.name: Ghulam
data.description:
Tough infantry that deal two attacks in rapid succession.
+ High armor
+ Higher attack damage on charge
- Lower base attack damage than a Man-at-Arms
- Slow movement
- Countered by Knights, Lancers, and Crossbowmen

data.name: Elite Ghulam
data.description:
Tough infantry that deal two attacks in rapid succession.
+ High armor
+ Higher attack damage on charge
- Lower base attack damage than a Man-at-Arms
- Slow movement
- Countered by Knights, Lancers, and Crossbowmen

data.name: Handcannoneer
data.description:
Powerful all-purpose ranged infantry.
+ High damage
- High cost
- Slow movement speed
- Countered by Horsemen

data.name: Horseman
data.description:
Fast cavalry effective at raiding, flanking, and countering ranged units.
+ High movement speed
- Weak against melee units
- Countered by Spearmen

data.name: Veteran Horseman
data.description:
Fast cavalry effective at raiding, flanking, and countering ranged units.
+ High movement speed
- Weak against melee units
- Countered by Spearmen

data.name: Elite Horseman
data.description:
Fast cavalry effective at raiding, flanking, and countering ranged units.
+ High movement speed
- Weak against melee units
- Countered by Spearmen

data.name: Manjaniq
data.description:
Fires multiple projectiles dealing damage in an area.
+ Effective against massed units
+ Can use Incendiary projectiles for devastating area damage
 - Must be set up to fire

data.name: Scout
data.description:
Lightly armed cavalry effective at exploring the world, hunting wildlife, and herding Sheep.
+ Able to see into Stealth Forests
+ Health regeneration
+ High movement speed
- Very weak in combat

data.name: Spearman
data.description:
Infantry best used against mounted units.
+ Anti-cavalry specialist
- Weak against armored infantry
- Countered by Archers

data.name: Hardened Spearman
data.description:
Infantry best used against mounted units.
+ Anti-cavalry specialist
- Weak against armored infantry
- Countered by Archers

data.name: Veteran Spearman
data.description:
Infantry best used against mounted units.
+ Anti-cavalry specialist
- Weak against armored infantry
- Countered by Archers

data.name: Elite Spearman
data.description:
Infantry best used against mounted units.
+ Anti-cavalry specialist
- Weak against armored infantry
- Countered by Archers

data.name: Springald
data.description:
Effective at taking out siege engines at long range. Fires after quickly setting up.
+ Long range
+ Bonus damage vs. siege engines
- Trivial damage vs. buildings

data.name: Tower of the Sultan
data.description:
Massive infantry transport effective against buildings and walls. Move speed increases for each unit garrisoned inside.
+ Fires arrows
+ High ranged armor
+ High health
- Slow move speed when empty

data.name: Trade Ship
data.description:
Trade Ships generate Gold and Wood when assigned to a trade route with a Coastal Trade Post or another player's Dock.
- No combat

data.name: Trader
data.description: Traders generate Gold when assigned to trade with a Trade Post or another players Market. The distance between the trade target and Market determines the amount of Gold. Once assigned to trade, the Trader makes repeated trips between its Home Market and the trade target. You can assign a new Home Market if you wish to.

data.name: Transport Ship
data.description:
Large oared vessel able to transport land units across water.
+ Can be garrisoned by any unit
+ Uses sight range of units in garrison
- No combat

data.name: Villager
data.description:
Gathers Wood, Food, Stone, and Gold. Builds and repairs buildings and can repair siege engines and naval units.
- Weak in combat

data.name: Xebec
data.description:
Large sailed war vessel armed with broadside cannons.
+ Anti-structure specialist
- Low movement speed
